attributes.action: lower fuel prices for the public transport industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as i am a small coach operator i rely heavily on the county council system. at the current rate of fuel incraeses i will not be able to offer home to school transport much longer as we are limited on the contracted price.our local county council have said to turn the contracts back and they will issue them on an emergency basis to another operator(normaly at an inflated price) surely it is in our own interests to help with a % increase to the original operator than cost more on our council tax next year. we don't want a quick fix we need long term solutions
